short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The last bookmarking add-on you will use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Señalador

The minimalistic app designed for one thing.
Keep the bookmarks you want in one place privately and absolutely free.
Features

    No Ads ever.
    No sponsored results, 'Best of' or any social integration of the sort.
    Complete control of your bookmarks no 'smart' sync-ups.
    Passwordless authentication.
    Import from other sources like
        Pocket
        Firefox
        Chrome
        json
    Export
        HTML
        CSV
        json


Available on
    Google Chrome
    Opera
    Firefox for Desktop
    Firefox for Android
